title: Support Small Business | Guests: Rudy Giuliani & Franklin Graham | 12/17/20
description:
Rudy Giuliani joins to discuss where President Trump’s election challenges go from here and what happened to AG Bill Barr. Franklin Graham talks Operation Christmas Child and the biblical path for the future. A new document from members of Congress calls for Joe Biden to clamp down on the religious Right. Pennsylvania health officials have new COVID-19 guidelines for large gatherings where you might end up having sex. Small businesses are in trouble. One entrepreneur took her own life, and her mother wants her death counted as a COVID death. Glenn speaks to small business owners Catherine Hill, Dave Foldes, and Joe Crowley about why they’re struggling and has set up a way you can help them in their time of need.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
